title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra Official S-Pen International Model - (Green)
features: Take advantage of the expansive screen on Galaxy S22 Ultra. S Pen features a slim 0.7mm pen tip with 4,096 pressure levels to write and sketch as naturally and accurately as putting pen to paper.

Pull up the Air Command menu with a click of the S Pen button. Simply hover S Pen over the screen and click the button on the side to pull up features like Smart Select, Screen Write, Live Messages and more.
